class.name: AudioEffectEQ6
class.brief_description: Adds a 6-band equalizer audio effect to an audio bus. Gives you control over frequencies from 32 Hz to 10000 Hz. Each frequency can be modulated between -60/+24 dB.
class.description: Frequency bands: Band 1: 32 Hz Band 2: 100 Hz Band 3: 320 Hz Band 4: 1000 Hz Band 5: 3200 Hz Band 6: 10000 Hz See also [AudioEffectEQ], [AudioEffectEQ10], [AudioEffectEQ21].
